content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received multiple AI responses including executing Python files, reading, writing, and appending to files, executing shell commands, and replacing text in a file. Some commands returned errors, while others were successful. When attempting to replace text in a file, the command returned no matches found. Overall, I have interacted with multiple files and directories on my computer. Previous action of listing files in a directory returned an empty list.
"""

Latest Development:
"""

"args": {"directory": "<directory>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "<filename>",
